Channel mode +Ccnt set by weber.freenode.net.
I am trying to use promises to send sms through at commands

NeoXiD: there are a couple of things to consider here: (1) JS has a function invocation overhead (some functions are inlined, but not everything can be inlined or lambda lifted); (2) Grabbing properties out of the prototype chain is *slow*. Checking if a property exists in an object is *slow*; (3) keys(o).map(f) does two iterations because there's no fusion
in JS (and we can't have because side-effects);
doginal [~agriggs@unaffiliated/doginal] entered the room.

Grabbing properties out of the prototype chain is a hell of a lot faster than copying properties, though

(Inferring purity in JS is probably difficult when `1 + 2` might have side-effects)
Though as has been pointed out, don't prematurely optimize, don't even start unless response times or CPU time is a bottleneck for you
